> URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1763888&view=rev

> Followup to r1763837. Add revision, when elements where dropped to
> saveservice.properties. Bugzilla Id: 60222

> Modified:
>     jmeter/trunk/bin/saveservice.properties
>     jmeter/trunk/src/core/org/apache/jmeter/save/SaveService.java

I don't think this is the correct fix for the test files.

The idea was to have JMX files for each version of JMeter.
For upwards compatibility, the plan should always be loadable, though some of the test elements will be replaced by the Obsolete Gui.

However some stricter tests such as checking that the JMX does not change when saved will obviously fail. Such tests need to be adjusted, rather than adjusting the test data.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
The old testplans will be restored with the following changes. TestSaveServices has been changed to look for Saved... files that represent the testplans as saved with a current version. When such a file is found it will be used to compare the load-saved file against, instead of the original one.

@sebb Is this OK with you?
